109711020.evoFlair_: You damn sinner! If words won't get through to you, then I'll make you see the light with fistfuls of love!

110711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Summon a Divine Birdsong.
110711010.baseFlair_: May I have a word with you? I wish to offer some counsel in your hour of doubt. Live as freely as a bird in flight... It will keep that ugly, conflicted expression off your face.
110711010.evoFlair_:
Skree!
(She's a good person, but that was harsh...)
—Regal Falcon

111711030.baseFlair_: The moonlight, it's delectable. One time, when it was as white as can be, I took a teensy bite of it. Mmm, delicious, I thought. But recently I found a way to make it taste even better. You wanna know how?
111711030.evoFlair_: Humans. They talk a lot and capture my sisters, so I'm not fond of them. But, mmm, humans. They complement moonlight so well. The combination of flavors, it's exquisite.

112711030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4. The next time damage is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, reduce damage to that follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
112711030.baseFlair_: If faith becometh thy heart, then upon facing the trial, the judge of such devotion shall appear, white and magnanimous. Should it deem thee worthy, thou shalt enjoy the protection of the gods' mercy. —Oracle of a Distant Land
112711030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112711030.evoFlair_: The battle was gruesome; I was flinging prayers as much as I was swinging my sword. But that's when I saw the divine beast. Suddenly my body felt light, and I was impervious to my enemies' attacks. —Holy Knight of a Distant Land

113711030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If an evolved allied follower is in play, gain +2/+0.
113711030.baseFlair_:
"That scar? Got it way back... was on the wrong side of a divine beast." The wounded bandit curled up his lips.
"He had claws like razors and fangs like nails—a monster in every sense of the word."
The listeners imagined a most terrifying creature.
113711030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113711030.evoFlair_:
"Once it readies its weapons, everything's over."
The bandit proudly pointed to his old wound.
"They're ancient armaments... If they lock onto you, there's no hope of escape."
The listeners shuddered at the thought of such terror.

114711030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If at least 2 allied amulets are in play, gain Storm.
114711030.baseFlair_:
Carry the heaviest object you can find. Do not fear—rather, take delight in the act. Your glorious wings will surely guide you down a righteous path.
—Book of Eulogies on Nature
114711030.evoFlair_: Those most blessed by nature must bear the brunt of the responsibility. Winged rats are no exception, and so it is their daily routine to transport a spiked ball. With a full twenty days until the next recess, fulfillment of this duty requires true resolve.

115711010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, summon a Holy Cavalier, then remove this effect.
115711010.baseFlair_:
When the world was abandoned by its god, an evil god usurped power. Evil armies appeared all over the world.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 2
115711010.evoFlair_:
The minions of evil appeared before us. They closed the doors of heaven, burned the lands to ash, and dried up the seas.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 3

116711010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Pious Fox.
116711010.baseFlair_: There once was a kingdom shrouded in darkness. One day a nun arrived and sent prayers into the sky. The shadows parted, and miracles rained upon the land. The nun told the rejoicing people, "If you need something from the gods, ask. They aren't as far off as you think."
116711010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116711010.evoFlair_:
"But I think you seem so near! Why, you're practically hovering over me!"
"That's easy for you to say. You can see us."
—Conversation between Sol Sister and the Guardians of All

117711020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of allied amulets in play.
117711020.baseFlair_: You're sayin' I get yum-yums for every sanctum I find? That means if I fly up high, I'll find lotsa sanctyums—uhh, I mean sanctums!
117711020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117711020.evoFlair_:
He mastered wind magic so he could eat to his heart's content? If such powerful determination isn't faith, then what is?
—Calm Featherfolk

117711030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Randomly summon a Summon Pegasus or Pinion Prayer.
117711030.baseFlair_:
According to observers, this bird is best viewed from above—its prismatic plumage stands out against the snowfields, allowing friendly flocks to pinpoint its location.
—Guide to Rare Frontier Birds, Hues on Snowy Canvases
117711030.evoFlair_:
Its feathers are a gift to all who fly the skies. The fallen plumes refract light in different ways, each attracting its own genus of downy admirers.
—Guide to Rare Frontier Birds, Hues on Snowy Canvases

118711020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied followers with Ward in play.
118711020.baseFlair_:
I don't know how this armor works, but having it on is so invigorating! I could fight for days!
—Holy Armor Chronicles, Day One
118711020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118711020.evoFlair_:
We must not falter, everyone. As long as there are lives depending on our protection, we must fight till our hearts stop beating.
—Holy Armor Chronicles, Day Seven

119711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
119711010.baseFlair_: A kind angel once taught me the right way to ring these bells. Want me to show you? Here goes! Ding-dong, ding-dong! Can you hear the bells of joy?
119711010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If any allied amulets are in play, deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
119711010.evoFlair_: All right, time to move on to the golden bell. Let's ring it nice and loud so they can hear it all the way up in heaven!

121711020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
Enhance (5): Subtract 5 instead. Then, if that amulet's Countdown reached 0, destroy a random enemy follower.
121711020.baseFlair_: Hark unto me. This falcon staff I bear shall purge your sins. O you souls that wander this bleak world, hear my words, for they are prophecy.
121711020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121711020.evoFlair_: Repent, for the sins of your soul have been exposed by the moon's light! Gaze upon my brow and say your final prayers... for you shall find salvation in the great beyond!

122711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 allied amulets are in play, deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
122711010.baseFlair_: Cleanliness is next to godliness! It's my job to spread the light of the heavens, so I can't look dull and sloppy.
122711010.evoFlair_: The gods are always watching over us, so we must keep ourselves and our surroundings in tip-top pristine condition!

123711010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Evolve this follower.
At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
123711010.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. Let peaceful sleep blanket the world and nestle in your heart. Do not awaken; fall ever deeper into the depths. Let the doctrine be your shepherd and sink into repose.
123711010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, deal 3 damage to 3 random enemy followers.
123711010.evoFlair_: The Ten Omens were bestowed upon the world on a tablet of sapphire stone. Upon the trials' completion, the stone crumbled, but devoted disciples of repose roused themselves from slumber and embarked on a pilgrimage.

123711020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Draw a card. If at least 5 allied followers had Ward when they were destroyed this match, draw 2 cards instead.
123711020.baseFlair_: To all temple visitors seeking healing, please make an orderly line. Take a ticket and a member of our clergy will guide you to the examination room when your number is called.
123711020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
123711020.evoFlair_: Providence has led this flock of lambs to me, and I will do my duty to see them all restored to good health. Now, now. What did I say about cutting in line? Your turn will come, so be patient.

124711030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets. If any Countdowns reached 0 due to this effect, gain Bane.
124711030.baseFlair_: Feathers are the symbol of freedom. Cut yourselves loose and break free from your cages with your feathers! Have you ever seen a feather so sharp?
124711030.evoFlair_: Those oppressed by the empire saw it firsthand—the four feathers that dared to resist. This glimpse of hope would be the catalyst for them to break free from the birdcages of their hearts and take freedom for themselves.

125711020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
125711020.baseFlair_: I root out the evils that heaven cannot. The teachings of the church, the moral precepts to which I adhere... I put them aside while I don this mask.
125711020.evoFlair_: The church's teachings are absolute. I cannot disobey them. That is why I wear this mask—so I can shed the trappings of that dutiful abbess, and instead mete out true justice.

126711030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Hallowed Dogma into your hand.
126711030.baseFlair_: Legend has it that this fleet-footed beast was a hunting companion of a god-king of yore. These days, the holy armor-clad beast stalks the halls of the temple, hunting down light-fingered miscreants who would pilfer offerings from the altar.
126711030.evoFlair_: The cheetah is not as prideful as a lion or tiger, but it is a more highly skilled hunter. In place of the beasts it once hunted, it now puts its talents to use chasing down thieves.

127711010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Destroy an enemy follower and restore 2 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever your leader's defense is restored, gain +0/+1.
127711010.baseFlair_:
"God's chosen will brand the commandment unto his followers." What drivel. The family is nothing more than a bunch of self-serving lackeys bound by an oath. That's what I believed. I didn't trust any of them.
—Seraphic Gallows: Memories of a Convict, Part 1
127711010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127711010.evoFlair_:
He was the only one who agreed with me, and the only person I could trust. In a corner of the slums, we made our pact: "We'll look out for each other. I'll give everything to protect only you."
—Seraphic Gallows: Memories of a Convict, Part 2

127711020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Strike: If you've played at least 5 cards using their Crystallize effect this match, give +1/+0 to all other allied followers with 2 attack or less.
127711020.baseFlair_:
Well, to paraphrase Ren, we're all on the same team, so... getting to know each other through battle isn't a bad idea.
—Tsubasa Takanashi
127711020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127711020.evoFlair_:
Anyway, she's right. We have more in common than you think. I'm just as stubborn as you, and I don't have what you'd call an approachable personality either!
—Tsubasa Takanashi

128711010.baseEffect_:
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, draw a card.
Once on each of your turns, when defense is restored to your leader, draw a card.
128711010.baseFlair_:
In my garden of roses, I feel your touch,
Rosy palms embracing me in fiery clutch,
Roasting chestnuts so sweet upon our noses;
Love withers not, in my garden of roses.
—Sisters of Edith: To Pureflame Lady
128711010.evoFlair_:
Sweet flower, must you remind me of her rosy lips? If only she were here... Oh?
Hello there, poor creature. You must be lost. But I'm afraid I can't let you in, lest our precious roses be hurt. Forgive me. Hyrah!

129711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Monastic Holy Water into your hand and change its cost to 1.
129711010.baseFlair_: Good evening! I'm this fox spirit's companion! Y'know, if you pet his three golden tails, a miracle will happen! But before that, let's see your offering—is what the fox spirit just said!
129711010.evoFlair_: Wow, sooo many offerings! Isn't this great, fox spirit? I mean, we're just copying what the gods do, so what's the harm? We help others, they help us!

900711130.baseFlair_:
Prayers and wishes manifest into a dim shield. Though the light be faint, thou must advance though the darkness.
—Chapter 4, Path to Salvation
900711130.evoFlair_: The shield is only a single sign, and your path is at last beginning. Pray more, wish again and grant thy wishes to god. The path to salvation is before thee. —Chapter 5, Path to Salvation

101721060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +0/+2 to an allied follower.
101721060.baseFlair_: Oh dear, you seem kinda down. There's no need to worry though—I'm here now!
101721060.evoFlair_: Hee-hee! Looks like I managed to cheer you up! High spirits are the best spirits, you know. It must be true, 'cause my master says it, too!

103721030.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
103721030.baseFlair_: Nothing can get me down! I have to keep going to save the world!
103721030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
103721030.evoFlair_: So many people have helped me! So now it's my turn to help them! I'll show them that the dark's just a joke.

104721030.baseEffect_: Whenever your leader's defense is restored, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
104721030.baseFlair_: Grant me power, holy bow! Unsullied power to dispel the dark!
104721030.evoFlair_: Ever since the day I was chosen by this holy bow, I've been ready to put my life on the line for the world!

110721010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Unicorn or Unicorn Spear into your hand.
110721010.baseFlair_:
"Why is there no end to war?" the maiden asked.
To her innocent question, the holy beast replied, "Those who enter into a contract with me will gain the power to end conflict."
"Then... I'd like to become your knight."
110721010.evoFlair_:
"Your power is limitless."
The beast shook its head, refusing the compliment. "The world," it said, "is still plagued by conflict."
"Then we have more work to do."

110721020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
110721020.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. There is no salvation for the world, but there is relief in the minds of the sleepers. If you too would believe, then close your eyes.
110721020.evoFlair_:
The Second Doctrine: Immerse Yourself Within
Seeking salvation from without is the origin of fault. Find the repose hidden inside and cherish it.
—Teachings of the Sleepers

111721020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Put a Monastic Holy Water into your hand.
-Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
111721020.baseFlair_: Oh, god dang it! The apostles of the holy court won't stand for you dark dwellers runnin' amok! If y'all don't settle down, I'll have to shoot you with my holy water bullets—and I'm outta practice, so don't make me do it!
111721020.evoFlair_: No, Mr. Zombie, stop it! People ain't for eatin'! Can you believe zombies go around doin' such bad stuff when they're such cute little varmints? What? Yer sayin' zombies ain't cute? The heck?!

112721010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Neutral follower from your deck into your hand.
112721010.baseFlair_: Welcome to the temple of tales most tall! Any structure designed to celebrate gods is really just venerating fairy tales. Anyway, hurry and come on in, and I'll give you my expert tour of the complex!
112721010.evoFlair_: You know that true fairy tales are born from deep-seated hopelessness, right? Take this temple: even though it's a house of god, there are no gods here. But that's all right. I'll summon a new ruler from the depths of Cocytus to reign over this cruel land.

112721020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied Machina follower +1/+1 and Rush.
112721020.baseFlair_: Salvation arrived in a form not unlike a machine. There it was, flying above the congregation, a falcon made of steel. It was battle ready and gave the people hope that they could fight back against the demons. —Church Records, Part 2
112721020.evoFlair_: Some strange robots appeared and left behind this mechanical falcon. Could it be one of God's messengers, sent to guide and warn us? In any case, everyone at the church can now worship in peace knowing a guardian on high flies above. —Layperson's Account, Part 2

113721010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
When you play another Machina card, gain Bane.
113721010.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. Robofalcon attempts to save others on its own; she, meanwhile, hopes to evoke ever more salvation from God. ―Notes from a Priory, Vol. 2
113721010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113721010.evoFlair_: Salvation from the sky is nice enough, but a precant like me can save everyone from the ground! H-how do you use this thingamajig anyhow? ―Robowing Precant to Robofalcon

114721020.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied amulet comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree comes into play, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
114721020.baseFlair_:
If injustice ever crosses your path, take a moment to act. Remember the gifts you have been given. The resolution you hold in your heart is what will allow you to carry out your mission.
—Book of Eulogies on Nature
114721020.evoFlair_: When our souls burn bright with justice, power surges within us. It serves as a reminder of the role bestowed upon us by the heavens above. Let us carry out our duty and make our presence known far and wide!

122721020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, if there are any allied followers with Ward in play that came into play after this follower, evolve this follower.
122721020.baseFlair_: The divine serpent splashes the holy spring's still waters, blessing mortals with cooling mists and soothing rains.
122721020.evoFlair_: The benevolent serpent sends floods not out of spite, but to answer mortals' prayers for full wells and fertile land.

123721030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, give your leader the following effect: The next time your leader takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
123721030.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest awakening. Awaken the world to their suffering and free your heart of tranquility. Do not slumber; march ever forward into cruel reality. The doctrine demands that you sink into despair.
123721030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, give your leader the following effect: The next time your leader takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
123721030.evoFlair_: The Ten Omens were returned to the world on a tablet of sapphire stone. Carved into a new column was the next Trial of Repose—Despair. Disciples returned to their sanctum to spread the doctrine of hopelessness.

124721010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
During your turn, whenever a card in play or in your hand is banished, gain +X/+0. X equals the number of cards banished.
124721010.baseFlair_:
He found himself surrounded by a verdant serenity, enveloped in silence. "Your soul seeks healing from the stains of the mortal world. Enter our temple, and cleanse yourself of the woes of mankind."
—Records of a Guest, Part 3
124721010.evoFlair_:
Days of peaceful asceticism provided the healing the man had sought out.
"Resting of the flesh is meaningless. Only through purification of the soul can one achieve true rest."
—Records of a Guest, Part 4

125721010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If at least 5 allied followers had Ward when they were destroyed this match, evolve this follower.
125721010.baseFlair_:
At the cathedral, long did she toil to gain mastery in the holy arts. Using sacred light to purify the wicked, she brings salvation.
"My brother is always caught up in the past... So I need to look forward and move ahead, for the both of us."
125721010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, put a random Havencraft follower from your deck into your hand.
125721010.evoFlair_:
To change her fate, she journeys on into the unknown future, alongside her brother. Though they know not where they go, they bear the light with them.
"No matter how traumatic it may be, there's no changing the past. Still, I'd like to believe that we can try again."

126721010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, draw a card.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, if you've played at least 5 cards using their Crystallize effect this match, draw a card.
126721010.baseFlair_:
The burdens you and I bear are like a feather and a boulder. They're entirely different.
—Tsubasa Takanashi
126721010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give Storm and Ward to another allied follower with 2 attack or less.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, if you've played at least 5 cards using their Crystallize effect this match, draw a card.
126721010.evoFlair_:
That's why I came to my decision. I don't care what anyone says... Giving up is the right choice.
—Tsubasa Takanashi

127721010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to your leader.
127721010.baseFlair_:
By the commandments, one leader was chosen to guide the family. Though I loathed the providence that chose me, I accepted. As long as he was by my side, nothing else mattered.
—Seraphic Gallows: Memories of a Convict, Part 3
127721010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a random Condemned follower from your deck into your hand.
At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
127721010.evoFlair_:
I don't know when he started meeting in secret with other family members. "I'm doing this all for you, Alde. I'll look out for you as long as I live." Whatever your beliefs, whatever your secrets... I can trust you, right?
—Seraphic Gallows: Memories of a Convict, Part 4

128721010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a random 4-play-point Havencraft follower or Havencraft amulet from your deck into your hand.
128721010.baseFlair_:
Shall I compare thee to a stork so fair,
Delivering not newborns but purest joy?
Or a dandelion bright without compare,
Sunny rays beckoning so warm and coy?
—Sisters of Edith: To Elluvia
128721010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128721010.evoFlair_: Why storks? Well, they deliver babies, don't they? And that's like delivering happiness, which is what you give to me! Why dandelions, then? Because they're one of my favorite foods, right up there with peonies. And I want to be your favorite!

105731020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Until the start of your next turn, your leader can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
105731020.baseFlair_: Terrifying storms will soon assail this kingdom. We knights of the Red Branch shall oppose them, standing tall forever more.
105731020.evoFlair_: Let us pray for our kingdom's future: May the king be just. May his subjects be industrious. And may we Knights of the Red Branch remain ever diligent.

106731010.baseFlair_: A god was jealous of her beauty and sought to hide it. The cloud of death shrouded her, stealing away her light. —A Beautiful Star Shining, Chapter 3
106731010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give all other allied followers the following effect until the end of the turn - Reduce damage to 0.
106731010.evoFlair_: Despite being enveloped in the cloud of death, she never gives up hope. Her saintly heart turns to light, chasing away the cloud of death. Then her rays spread across the land. —A Beautiful Star Shining, final chapter

108731010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a White Diamond or Black Diamond into your hand.
108731010.baseFlair_: What's your favorite piece of jewelry? I've got everything from the cute stuff to the sexy stuff. Pick one, any one but only one!
108731010.evoFlair_: Sometimes it seems delicate, and sometimes it seems radiant. Jewelry makes people so lovely! Go on now, and take your pick!

109731010.baseFlair_: God has blessed me with another day of bliss. So I pray on the daily, and I train on the daily! So let's get another day of punchy prayers and prayerful punches started!
109731010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Lorena's Holy Water or Lorena's Iron Fist into your hand.
109731010.evoFlair_: God is kind. However, a perfect world cannot exist with only kindness. If you're hurt, God will tend to you. If you do bad things, you've got another thing coming!

113731020.baseEffect_: At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy all followers.
113731020.baseFlair_: This body is a pair of heavenly scales, the cornerstone of peace. You can leave your judgments to me. Put your flesh and mind on the balance of righteousness.
113731020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy all followers.
113731020.evoFlair_: Imbalance is the source of errors—a strong flesh and weak mind or the opposite are naturally the same. Learn your own weakness, disturber of the scales.

116731010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied amulet and put a copy of it into your hand. If it's a Naterran Great Tree, change its cost to 0.
116731010.baseFlair_:
Spread kindness. Alight among the suffering. Remind the people of largesse. And, above all, keep always a tender heart, for that will draw in followers on your sacred quest.
—On the Glory of Nature
116731010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 1 from the cost of an amulet in your hand.
116731010.evoFlair_:
The road to hell is paved with sloth and machinery. But now, my enlightened, it is time to rise. Become guides. Point the lost in the right direction. Light will banish darkness, and virtue will never fade from this world.
—Illustrious Calling, Part 3

116731020.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever an effect restores defense to an ally, give +0/+1 to all allied non-Machina followers and +1/+1 to all other allied Machina followers.
116731020.baseFlair_: With the advent of machinery, our creed has been given new life. Ye faithful, give in to impulse; affirm your convictions by cracking the steel whip. Deny yourself nothing, and deny nothing of yourself—that is how prayers gain power. —Annals of the Grand Church
116731020.evoFlair_:
There are some that would call our dependence on the conveniences of technology "depravity." But if this is depravity, so be it, for it is a necessary evil. Darkness will banish light, and vice will never fade from this world.
—The Cult of Salvation

118731010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower and then X damage to the enemy leader. X equals half the number of allied amulets destroyed this match (rounded up).
118731010.baseFlair_: I was duped into giving up our private vineyard. Perhaps it was a message from God, as I'm not exactly getting any younger. But I can't hold back the tears when I think on the times my late husband and I spent building it together... —Eidos Church Confessional 3
118731010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Banish an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
118731010.evoFlair_:
We're looking for a mafia family's top brass and a stolen deed to a parcel of land. Because a member of the church was lost, the sheriff's department will be assisting us. Details are in the letter... May God be with us.
—Anvelt, Eidos Church Minister

118731020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to your leader.

109711010.evoFlair_: Long ears are the picture of good health. At least, that's what my family says. They're so fluffy and embarrassing, though... N-no one's looking, right?

110711030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3 and Ward.
At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, restore 1 defense to all allies.
110711030.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. To sleep in peace during calm hours is both a blessing and a comfort.
110711030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
110711030.evoFlair_:
The First Doctrine: Spread Peaceful Slumber
Do not contribute to the spite and agony which govern the world. Sleep is your escape. Dreams are your peace.
—Teachings of the Sleepers

112711010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
112711010.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was the prayers of a young acolyte. Though she followed the correct precepts, it was the machine that answered her call and blessed her with fists of iron. —Church Records, Part 1
112711010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112711010.evoFlair_: That nun, she's become our savior. She uses those arms of hers to help as many people as she can. I hear she even prays for their continued safety after her deeds are done. —Layperson's Account, Part 1

115711030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random amulet that costs 1 play point or less from your deck into play.
Enhance (7): Gain +4/+4 and Ward.
115711030.baseFlair_: Not only humans offer up their devotion to God. All who live have their own forms of prayer. Take, for instance, the saintly griffon, whose shrieks ring out in adoration.
115711030.evoFlair_: Prayer blends into our daily lives like balm sinking into the skin. In the same fashion, the animals' way of life is in itself an expression of devotion. The saintly griffon's shriek is its way of conveying both prayer and blessing.

116711030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Beastcall Aria.
Enhance (6): Subtract 3 from its Countdown.
116711030.baseFlair_: This holy fowl loves to strut down garden walkways. It's beloved by the townspeople, who have adopted it as a mascot. If you ever run across one, wait for it to cock its head—simply adorable.
116711030.evoFlair_:
So you are having existential doubts? Then I urge you, take to the air. Find yourself. That is what our wings are for.
—Garuda, Wings of Paradise

120711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower with Crystallize or amulet with Countdown from your deck into your hand.
120711010.baseFlair_: Having different-colored wings to everyone else isn't a bad thing, you know. I mean, look for yourself. Don't you think they add a splash of color to the clear blue sky?
120711010.evoFlair_:
In a certain town, where the rains are scarce, you can sometimes spy a rainbow. They say if you wave at it, like magic, the storms in your heart will clear like the sky above.
—Going Where the Wings Take Us

120711020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Evolve this follower.
Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
120711020.baseFlair_: My flail is a light that dogs accursed darkness wheresoever it goes. Let it illuminate your sins, that I may smash them to dust.
120711020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120711020.evoFlair_: My flail is imbued with holy light. In other words, the gods watch over my deeds. Stand, therefore, upon your dignity for they will witness your rebirth.

121711010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Draw a card. Restore 1 defense to the enemy leader.
121711010.baseFlair_: How may Eschamali help you today? Hmm. I see. You require funds to rebuild the shopping district. Very well, please take a seat. Let's talk about finding the right balanced loan for you.
121711010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121711010.evoFlair_: Say what you will, but recovery efforts require money, and that's where we come in. It's really all thanks to Marlone; the funds he left are being put to good use. Whatever you've lost, we'll help you rebuild—you need only call on us, the new Eschamali!

125711030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Summon a Zlatorog. Evolve all unevolved allied Zlatorogs.
Last Words: Draw a card.
125711030.baseFlair_: A beast with resplendent golden horns. It is said to guard paradise alongside a young maiden. Avaricious poachers rue the day when they encounter this sacred beast—and often find themselves impaled upon its horns.
125711030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125711030.evoFlair_: A sacred beast given new life. It is said that from the land upon which its blood was spilt grew the first edelweiss flower. When it detects avarice in abundance, it does not hesitate to use its golden horn as a weapon and gore greedy hunters.

128711020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Star Torrent into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Enhance (7): Summon 2 Regal Falcons.
128711020.baseFlair_: Today's my first day on holy water duty. See these wings of water? They're a gift from my goddess. Her grace infuses the water with even more power. There's plenty to go around, so take as much as you'd like.
128711020.evoFlair_: I should take a day off? Well, I'd love to go home and relax, but... these wings make the place as humid as a rainy summer day. It's so unbearable, I'd rather work.

900711010.baseFlair_: A white bird descends from heaven to answer the prayers of the pious. Its glow lights the darkness; its beak pecks away at the forces of evil.
900711010.evoFlair_: A white bird descends from heaven to answer the prayers of the pure-hearted. Its screech rings out through the darkness, scattering the forces of evil.

900711110.baseFlair_: When the scales imbued in faith are bountiful from prayer, a divine serpent will be awakened to consume the venom of animosity.
900711110.evoFlair_: The luster of its scales glows a ghastly white—those caught before its fiery red gaze will be exorcised from within.

900711120.baseFlair_: When the final grain of sand has fallen, the cerulean keeper will be awakened, wings aflutter like the winds of time.
900711120.evoFlair_: The flapping of its cerulean wings reveal the flow of time—its flutters exorcising beyond time and space.

900711140.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
900711140.baseFlair_:
"We have to take care of that root-brute Vile Mother!"
Forever loyal, forever determined.
"Lord Valdain's plan depends on it!"
He faithfully carries out his orders, confidence guiding his path.
900711140.evoFlair_:
"I'm a major, you hear! Nothing scares me!"
His chest puffs out in a display of bravado.
"I'll make Lord Valdain hop-poppin' proud if it's the last thing I do!"
The major rushes off, keen to attend to his duties.

101721010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
During the opponent's turn, subtract 1 from damage taken by this follower.
101721010.baseFlair_: Prayer! That is what protects me! My pleading is turned into a light which envelops my body!
101721010.evoFlair_: My prayers form a shield that protects my master. There is nothing the forces of evil can do to penetrate it!

101721020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Countdown amulet from your deck into your hand.
101721020.baseFlair_: Wow! Those monsters attacked a church? They must be really bad! Come here, monsters! Let me give you a spanking!
101721020.evoFlair_: I prayed and prayed and got this club! It changes into whatever shape I'm thinking of! Just goes to show I've got justice on my side. Come here, monsters! Let me give you a pummeling!

101721070.baseFlair_: Anyone can connect to the spirits which sleep within the earth. They must only close their eyes and use their hearts to see. Come on and try it!
101721070.evoEffect_: Evolve: Restore 4 defense to an ally.
101721070.evoFlair_: The mighty spirits provide both protection and affection. That is why we shamans offer them our gratitude each and every day.

101721080.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Whenever an allied amulet comes into play, gain +1/+1.
101721080.baseFlair_: Prayer is the source of my strength and courage.
101721080.evoFlair_: I have grown strong as a result of people's prayers. Now the time has come for me to repay this debt.

102721010.baseFlair_: You're on sacred ground! And it's certainly no place for the likes of you! My hammer of purity will crush you right down to your soul!
102721010.evoFlair_: Looks like I've overdone it! I can't believe I destroyed the ceiling! It's all your fault for being so weak!

103721040.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, destroy that follower at the end of the opponent's turn.
103721040.baseFlair_: Ooh! You obviously have fortune on your side! (Not really. I can tell your time's just about up!)
103721040.evoFlair_: Ooh! You're incredibly lucky! (You're unlucky to run into the likes of me!)

106721020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Subtract 3 from damage your leader takes. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
106721020.baseFlair_: You who have crossed high waves, withstood terrible storms, and made it to my island, this place is cherished by God. Nothing can threaten you here.
106721020.evoFlair_: You who have crossed tribulation, withstood terrible suffering, and made it to my island, this place is your sanctuary. You too are bathed in the love of the gods.

108721010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Holy Lion Crystal into your hand.
108721010.baseFlair_: Prayer gives form to the gods' streaming light. Allow me to hand you one fragment of salvation.
108721010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108721010.evoFlair_: This fragment underlies the coming peace. May placidness soon be yours.

109721020.baseFlair_: Um, excuse me. Where is this place? I wandered off of the main road because I saw some people in need, but then I dropped my map of sacred places. Ahh... What am I going to do?
109721020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Randomly summon a copy of an allied follower that has been destroyed during this turn.
109721020.evoFlair_: You'll show me the way? That's so nice of you! To thank you for your kindness, would you like to hear about our ward and provider, Zeyen?

116721020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied Natura amulets are in play, gain +1/+1. Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
116721020.baseFlair_:
Do not fear. Step forth into the world. Shine light on that which is indispensable. Listen well to cries for help, for they will spur you on your sacred quest.
—On the Glory of Nature
116721020.evoFlair_:
Many people want immediate results. So they give up on prayer and turn to machines. But when they do, they forget something important: prayers are neither a thing nor a motion. Prayers are thoughts and beliefs.
—Illustrious Calling, Part 2

117721010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly put a 4-play-point Havencraft follower or amulet from your deck into your hand.
117721010.baseFlair_: The Four of Wands is a pillar of respite. Its four great legs advance steadily, marking the places it has trod, while the sanctuary on its back shines with a holy light, a silent beacon of peace.
117721010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117721010.evoFlair_: The auspicious tortoise crosses the blessed lands. Its pace is plodding. Its stride is limited. But each step is measured. The tracks it leaves are themselves blessed markers of pilgrimage. A chorus of joyous voices follows it wheresoever it goes.

120721010.baseFlair_: I'm not a kid anymore—I've got to start acting like a grown-up lady worthy of my lineage. Hehe. That's why I'm going to use this staff I ordered just for the occasion and spread charity wherever I go!
120721010.evoFlair_: If there are scoundrels in the east, I'll slap them down with this pricey staff! If there are hearts clouded by envy in the west, the sparkle of this amazing staff will set their minds on loftier things! Ahh, charity work is so freaking amazing!

123721010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
123721010.baseFlair_: You might want to start training the young'uns. That was my subtle way of saying I'm getting ready to retire. These old wings can't fly like they used to. Ironic, isn't it? I once soared so high, and now I'm looking up at others taking to the skies.
123721010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon a Graywing Featherfolk and give it Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
123721010.evoFlair_: Looking up at the sky, I had an epiphany. I don't need to carry every burden myself; the kids have got everything under control. Knowing that, my body feels as light as a feather. With the next generation secure, I can fly to the ends of the earth!

128721020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and restore 1 defense to your leader. Do this 1 time.
Enhance (8): Do this 5 times instead.
During your turn, whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers (up to 10 times per turn).
128721020.baseFlair_:
Would that thou melt me with thy chocolate gaze,
Into the soft embrace of candied claws,
Whisper my name with lips of raspberry glaze.
Show my heart burns lonely without good cause.
—Sisters of Edith: To Pureflower Maiden
128721020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128721020.evoFlair_: Upon these hallowed grounds, sisterhood is a bond not only of love but great power. With her sweetness by my side, my flames shall burn brighter than ever before.

104731020.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to a random allied follower. If no other allied followers are in play, deal 2 damage to your leader instead.
104731020.baseFlair_: I'm the queen of bad luck, so stay away from me. You'll end up as unlucky as me if you get too close.
104731020.evoFlair_: There's always some sort of disaster happening to me. My city was turned to gold, but I'll never give up—never.

111731010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mark of Balance into both players' hands.
111731010.baseFlair_: To abide is to sin, and this world is full of sinners. What is wrong with that? Sin is sin, and that's all. You need only to pay penance. To atone.
111731010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Mark of Balance into both players' hands.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
111731010.evoFlair_: We control the balance, even if that's a bit of an outlandish thing to suggest. It's about preservation, at least until it all comes to an end. And I suspect that's where things are heading. But who's to say? This world can be kind to its people.

111731020.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
At the end of your opponent's turn, give +0/+1 to all other followers.
111731020.baseFlair_:
She is a goddess of malice, who holds dominion over plagues. The helmet she wears, a crown fashioned from the corpse of a noble beast, is proof of her cruelty.
"No, wait! I bought this hat from a regular merchant! I just thought it looked nice..."
111731020.evoEffect_:
At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all other followers.
At the end of your opponent's turn, give +0/+2 to all other followers.
111731020.evoFlair_:
She is a goddess of malice, who holds dominion over plagues. It is said she can summon storms with a mere flick of her fan, laying waste to whatever displeases her.
"I can't help it... Sometimes it gets muggy, and you just need to fan yourself, right?"

115731010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of allied followers with Ward that have been destroyed this match.
Enhance (5): Deal X damage to an enemy follower.
115731010.baseFlair_:
With the false god slain, we conducted reconnaissance. The dire circumstances of the world remained unchanged. The forces of evil were still abroad, and increasing in number.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 8
115731010.evoFlair_:
My name is Wilbert, Captain of the Eclair Holy Knights. My conclusion is as follows: This world was doomed the moment God abandoned it.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 9

115731020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Union Burst (10): Until the end of your opponent's turn, give all allies the following effect - Reduce damage from effects to 0.
115731020.baseFlair_: If you're ever in trouble, you can count on me. I'll have you know, I take my work seriously—and I'm good at what I do!
115731020.evoFlair_: I think I deserve a pint for all my hard work... Meep! No, Yukari, no! You can't ruin your hardworking image that way!

117731020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Lorena's Holy Water into your hand.
During your turn, when defense is restored to your leader, if it's the second time this turn, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
117731020.baseFlair_: God mourns whenever one of his lambs is wounded. But there's no need to worry—we just have to fortify our bodies and souls! Okay, everyone! Into position! We'll start with one hundred prayers and one hundred crunches!
117731020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the allied follower with the highest attack in play.
117731020.evoFlair_: God watches over our efforts—all the more reason to continue our good work! Now then, everyone! Pick up your scripture! We're going to do some heavy lifting today!

119731010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
If this follower has 2 defense or less, whenever an allied follower attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
119731010.baseFlair_: Cloudy skies have a tendency to darken the hearts of people. It saps them of their vigor and their kindness... How terrifying. I want to use my power to sweep the clouds away. I'm sure that is why the sun gave me its blessing.
119731010.evoFlair_: Even now, I remember the beautiful sight of sunlight piercing through the clouds; of trees and plants regaining their verdant vigor; smiles gracing the faces of the people. If I can warm everybody with this blessing, as the sun did back then... then I can ask for no more.

127731020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a random 3-play-point amulet with Countdown from your deck into your hand. If at least 5 allied amulets have been destroyed this match, evolve this follower.
127731020.baseFlair_:
Eager to fathom the world below, I became a holy lion. The sacred grounds I called my home were governed by a mighty family. However, the family was rotting from the inside with internal strife.
—Transmigration of Penance, Part 1
127731020.evoFlair_:
The family's second-in-command pleaded his innocence, to no avail. The ensuing chaos cost the lives of many innocent holy beasts, myself included. As I fell into eternal slumber, I saw the don trembling.
—Transmigration of Penance, Part 2

107741010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. Restore 3 defense to all other allied followers.
107741010.baseFlair_: For the wretched, confined in despair and desolation—I have heard the gods' decree! I shall guide you to glory, and together we shall obliterate the dark!
107741010.evoFlair_: Swear on the gods' banner, and let despair consume you no longer! A new promised land awaits us—embrace the light of tomorrow!

112741010.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect restores defense to an ally, draw a card.
112741010.baseFlair_: No matter the struggles you face, I promise that I'll bring you that much happiness in turn. Even though I'm a bit of a disaster-prone ruler, I'll face everything head-on and march toward a brighter future! Now, watch as I take my first step... Huh? Where'd this hole—
112741010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Restore 2 defense to all allies.
Whenever an effect restores defense to an ally, draw a card.
112741010.evoFlair_: Be it storms or monsters... or mysterious holes that pop out of nowhere, we'll overcome all obstacles and bring about a happy future! I'll never stop my efforts to return our city to its former glory! Even if... Even if meteors rain down upon us! Huh? Look up? Why?

117741020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Enhance (6): Randomly summon a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied followers that had Ward when they were destroyed this match.
Whenever an allied follower with Ward is destroyed, gain +2/+2.
117741020.baseFlair_: Allies are like baggage—they'll only slow you down. That's what I used to think, and to tell the truth, I probably have gotten soft. Somehow, though, I feel invincible. We're all going to come out of this alive! So fly true, my spear!
117741020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117741020.evoFlair_: I don't need anyone else. I can fight and win my own battles. Losing's the worst. That's what the old me would have said. But now I know there's something a lot worse, and that's losing my comrades!

120741010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all allies and enemies.
Enhance (7): Evolve this follower and deal 5 damage instead.
120741010.baseFlair_: The holy maiden became aware of the gods' absence and despaired. She did not deign to fall, but swore a vow of salvation. If this world was no more than a godless purgatory, then the end would be a mercy. "The gods are dead, so my blade shall pass judgment in their stead."
120741010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
120741010.evoFlair_: Light and dark are both means to salvation for the maiden. Whether one reveres man or reviles the gods is irrelevant. If the result is succor for the people, then she will do what she must, even should the world turn against her. "Accept despair, for at its end is mercy."

120741030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Give your leader the following effect: Once on each of your turns, when you play a Havencraft follower, recover 1 evolution point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
120741030.baseFlair_: Fall... from grace? Whatever do you mean? By the grace of the gods, our place is here and our way is just. Forgive me, but I do not understand a word of what you speak.
120741030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Banish an enemy follower or enemy amulet.
120741030.evoFlair_: Ah, I perceive your meaning! In your vile jealousy, you wish to shed the gods' grace and foment rebellion! Why, you should have spoken plainly! Then I shall respond thus: there is no place for you either in heaven or on earth.

121741010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy X random enemy followers. X equals the number of enemy followers in play minus the number of allied followers in play.
121741010.baseFlair_: Prayers are a fool's fancy. Omnipotence is not the purview of the gods, but of the wealthy. Unlike the gods, cash is easy to understand. For every life you take and each thing you destroy there is a reward. We're all going to die anyway; why not enjoy ourselves while we can?
121741010.evoFlair_: The man, realizing the error of his ways, broke down and wept. He received a brand and a commandment: "Give and liberate." Roaming from place to place, he preached balance for souls seeking salvation in a godless age, offering atonement where the gods could not.

122741020.baseEffect_:
Ward.

Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
122741020.baseFlair_:
For as long as I can remember, I've been bound to a greater cause. But my true self still suffocates beneath a mask.
—Kagura Kirisame
122741020.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Ward.
At the end of your turn, restore 5 defense to your leader and this follower.
122741020.evoFlair_:
I only wish to liberate my true self... and surely the key lies somewhere within the cards.
Cut down all who stand in our way! Holy Saber!
—Kagura Kirisame

I only wish to liberate my true self... and surely the key lies somewhere within the cards.
Cut down all who stand in our way! Holy Saber!
—Kagura Kirisame

Ward.

Enhance (6): Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers. Restore 2 defense to your leader. Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
125741020.baseFlair_: Onward I bear the Lord's standard, to a brighter tomorrow! Though the path may be perilous, and we may be beset on all sides by darkness, fear not! My blade will protect you and pave the way forward!
125741020.evoEffect_:
Ward.

101714020.baseFlair_: Blessed are thy deeds, O ye of faith.

120714010.baseEffect_:

109724010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Holy Lion Crystal into your hand.

110724010.baseEffect_: Give Storm to an allied follower.

—Unicorn Knight

116734010.baseFlair_: The truth slumbers, lost in the din of war. If only someone would rouse it, then surely the world would be saved. "Please, reconcile your differences. If we are to have any hope of victory, you must join forces!"

100713030.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)

100713030.baseFlair_: It's an honor to be chosen as an offering—if only to come in contact with such a sublime being.

101713050.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)

101713050.baseFlair_: Following the echoes of the flute, the gleaming bird goddess alights.

114741030.evoFlair_: Stoked by prayer, the ruddy censer of Erythron harbors a restorative flame, while anger fuels the azure mace Kyanos's icy destruction. The vessels shine, powered by people's good and evil deeds. The world is not black and white, but perhaps it can be red and blue.

118741020.evoFlair_: The oppressed cry out for justice. As God's instruments of divine judgment, we shall answer the call. Train yourselves and prep your cannons. We must be ready to act when their cries crescendo into a eulogy for the heavens. —Anvelt, Judgment's Cannon

120741020.baseFlair_: I love how a good party puts smiles on people's faces. Allow me to bestow blessings for all your hard work. Hold your heads up high, my children, for the fruits of your civilization are wondrous to behold! Upon my adorable broken fang, you have my seal of approval.
120741020.evoFlair_: The mortal world is the best playground I could ask for. I would see my children prosper and create even more amusements. Everybody's having a good time; don't spoil their fun. I swear upon my missing fang that nothing shall blight this blessed land.

124741030.evoFlair_: A shattered halo. A light of reckoning. Three cities destroyed in a single blow. The annihilation of sin itself through martial fury. Behold the true form of light, formed by prayer. A god of war, born from faith.

125741030.evoFlair_: Heaps of rubble and ash abound where civilizations once stood—the product of man's failure and folly. Corporeal beings beget pain and suffering. It is in only in wanton destruction that we can rid the world of pain—all must be returned to nothing.

127741020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127741020.evoFlair_: My wings will shred your oaths; no infidel's "commandments" can touch the divine. That an insignificant speck could cause such disharmony vexes me. Crawl upon the earth and weep at your folly, for winged execution awaits.

—Jeanne, A Hero's Tale, Pt. 7

701741010.baseFlair_: Come, all soldiers! I hereby make a vow upon this spear! God is on our side! Our victory is assured!
701741010.evoFlair_: I hereby make a vow in the name of God! We shall win this battle, even if I must give my life in order to ensure victory! Now come, follow me into the fray!

110741010.baseEffect_: When this follower leaves play, summon an Enstatued Seraph. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
110741010.baseFlair_: Be it from darkness or evil, from omen or chaos, I will save you so long as there is light beneath my wings. My victory will be your salvation!
110741010.evoFlair_: There is nothing to fear, for I will meet the unending darkness with unyielding light. So long as my wings lose not their radiance, the world shan't meet its end!

711741010.baseEffect_: When this follower leaves play, summon an Enstatued Seraph. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
711741010.baseFlair_: Be it from darkness or evil, from omen or chaos, I will save you so long as there is light beneath my wings. My victory will be your salvation!
711741010.evoFlair_: There is nothing to fear, for I will meet the unending darkness with unyielding light. So long as my wings lose not their radiance, the world shan't meet its end!

114741020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (2)
Last Words: Summon a Tutankhamun.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon a Tutankhamun. Give it Ambush.
114741020.baseFlair_:
They're a sight to behold from behind, yet a ghastly terror to witness from the front. You'll be safe if you're outdoors, but it's advised to say your prayers if you're indoors. What is this divine yet terrifying being?
—A popular riddle among city folk
114741020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114741020.evoFlair_: What we revere as a divine beast, the enemy deems a hideous monster. It traps foes and itself inside a barrier and proceeds to decimate them. We consider it an ally... just as long as we have the luxury of observing from outside of its barrier. —Border patrol's observation

126741030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Last Words: Draw a card.
----------
Rush.
Bane.
Fanfare: Summon 2 Holy Cavaliers. Give them Storm and evolve them.
126741030.baseFlair_: His valorous deeds are not the fruit of his physical strength; rather, he is girded by the triad of spear, book, and horn, and borne aloft by his steadfast hippogriff. But the deed that proves him a true holy knight is his quest to the moon to rescue his beloved friend.
126741030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126741030.evoFlair_:
Astolfo's gotten us into trouble many times, but he's saved me just as many times. My dear friend, I don't doubt that more trials await you, but I also know your noble heart is something not even the fiendish moon can tarnish.
—Roland the Incorruptible

109734010.baseFlair_: By this divine decree shall the purge begin.

104733010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all followers.
Last Words: Randomly put 3 of the following 4 cards into your hand: Servant of Darkness, Silent Rider, Dis's Damnation, and Astaroth's Reckoning.
104733010.baseFlair_: Beyond defilement lies corruption. —Prince of Darkness

102743010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon an Awakened Seraph.
102743010.baseFlair_: There was once a shattered statue sleeping in a lost capital. But only the birds saw it, as no man ever entered that forbidden land.

900743010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon a Renascent Seraph.
900743010.baseFlair_: The statue depicted a legendary angel who once fought to protect humanity. There were those who offered their prayers to this angel, and kept her in their hearts.

900743020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon a Seraph Lapis, Glory Be.
900743020.baseFlair_: Over the course of many years, the prayers of the innocent gradually weakened the hold of an ancient curse on the angel, slowly restoring her to glory.

900743030.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Win the match.
900743030.baseFlair_: The nameless seraph will be resurrected by the pure hearts and innocent prayers of humanity. She will be a radiant light to guide this world.

118711030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Summon a Bullet Bike.
Last Words: Summon a Regal Falcon.
----------
Rush.
Strike: Summon a Regal Falcon.
118711030.baseFlair_:
It was my fault for looking away... I value my black, roly-poly puppy more than I value my own life. Please, O Lord, won't you help me find him?
—Eidos Church Confessional 1
118711030.evoFlair_:
We're looking for a black puppy that's been missing for two days. Dispatch our eagles to assist with the search. Meanwhile, I will pray that it survives the savage wilds.
—Anvelt, Eidos Church Minister

111721010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (5): Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
----------
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
111721010.baseFlair_: Art thou not a heretic? If nay sayeth thee, evidence for grandest sin hath been had. Dutybound, then, am I to grant thine execution. If yea sayeth thee, proof of grandest sin hath been confessed. Again, duty bindeth me to execute thee.
111721010.evoFlair_: Hast thou committed heresy? Forsooth, blindly and impartially shall this inquisition will gleaneth the truth. Whether yea or nay, judgment shalt be delivered.

122721010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare and Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower. Draw a card.
122721010.baseFlair_: I've seen enough; you can stop assessing how much I'll fetch in an auction. I'm afraid you are the one who will be receiving judgment—by the gods above.
122721010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
122721010.evoFlair_:
Being an agent is a balancing act. I have to think like a human to keep my cover, but I can't get too deep into their minds if I am to judge them fairly.
...It's rather disconcerting when sinners look betrayed, as if I'd ever been on their side.

101731010.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, give it -2/-0.
101731010.baseFlair_: A dragon to be feared and worshipped. A divine messenger descended from heaven to identify and expel evil thoughts.
101731010.evoFlair_: The incandescent dragon has the power to rob the forces of evil of their desire to do battle. Darkness cannot hope to withstand its dazzling glow.

104741020.baseEffect_:
Reduce damage to this follower to 0.
Not affected by other cards' effects, except for those that change this card's attack or defense.
104741020.baseFlair_: Its radiance sears the eyes of the wicked. Its soaring divinity deflects the arms of the lowly. It is that which can and cannot be seen, that which is and is not. It is the untouchable armor of a god.
104741020.evoFlair_: Shining white armor that epitomizes infallible justice. It moves in accordance with the dictates of divine retribution and rules the wicked and lowly with an iron fist. For them, judgment day has come.

Not affected by other cards' effects, except for those that change this card's attack or defense.
703741010.baseFlair_: Its radiance sears the eyes of the wicked. Its soaring divinity deflects the arms of the lowly. It is that which can and cannot be seen, that which is and is not. It is the untouchable armor of a god.
703741010.evoFlair_: Shining white armor that epitomizes infallible justice. It moves in accordance with the dictates of divine retribution and rules the wicked and lowly with an iron fist. For them, judgment day has come.

109741020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
----------
Fanfare: Subtract 3 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Whenever an allied amulet is destroyed, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
109741020.baseFlair_: Your prayers have taken wing, stirring the winds of turmoil once more. The gold of heaven on high—try as they might, no one can surmount the ruler of storms.
109741020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
109741020.evoFlair_: Dare not raise your head, ground dweller. Simply acknowledge the sky above and the wind that envelops it—all is governed by his subjects. This spear I brandish upon you is a blessing.

109741030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put different Countdown amulets from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those amulets.
109741030.baseFlair_: Revered by humanity, he hunted down angels of corruption, tearing apart their wings and branding them. The gods recognized his deeds, but did not forgive him. He acknowledged the gods, but did not forgive them.
109741030.evoFlair_: He possessed the power to kill angels, but remained unable to challenge the gods—that blade remained locked in his heart. The gods merely use him as a tool, but he knows his day of vindication is nigh.

101741010.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play an amulet, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Destroy all allied amulets.
101741010.baseFlair_: God has been destroyed. There is no use in praying. Only one path to absolution remains: utter nihilism.
101741010.evoFlair_: The end is upon us. It is all part of the plan. Do not look back, children of gods. Do not resist, children of demons. There is only one path towards eternal peace: utter nihilism!
